Package com.bfo.netkeystore.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
com.bfo.netkeystore.server.Server
public class Server extends Object
The Server is the core class for the NetKeyStore Server package, representing a standalone webserver that presents as a Cloud Signture Consortium RSSP

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    SERVICE
    The ZeroConf service used by this Server, which is "_netkeystore.

    • getURL

      public String getURL()
      Return the URL the Webserver thinks it's listening on when running. This is only guaranteeed to be set after the server has started
      Returns:
      the URL

    • getPort

      public int getPort()
      Return the port the Webserver is listening on, or 0 if not started.
      Returns:
      the port

    • setCallbackHandler

      public void setCallbackHandler(CallbackHandler handler)
      Set the CallbackHandler to use for passwords, or null to retrieve them from the config file
      Parameters:
      handler - the handler

    • isStarted

      public boolean isStarted()
      Return true if the Webserver is started

    • configure

      public void configure(InputStream in, File base) throws Exception
      Configure the Server
      Parameters:
      in - an InputStream containing a YAML configuration. The stream is not closed
      base - the optional File against which any relative paths in the configuration are resolved against. Normally the absolute path of the configuration file.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the configuration is invalid for any reason

    • configure

      public void configure(Json config, File base) throws Exception
      Configure the Server
      Parameters:
      config - a configuration object
      base - the optional File against which any relative paths in the configuration are resolved against. Normally the absolute path of the configuration file.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the configuration is invalid for any reason

    • reload

      public void reload() throws Exception
      Reload any KeyStores
      Throws:
      Exception - if the keystore won't load

      public void start() throws Exception
      Start the webserver
      Throws:
      Exception - if the server won't start

    • stop

      public void stop() throws InterruptedException
      Stop the webserver
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the server was interruped while stopping
